casebody.data:
NASH HOSPITALS, INC.
v.
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE CO. No. 340P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Scott Lewis, Attorney at Law, Pamela Renee Lawrence, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Co. J. Christopher Dunn, Attorney at Law, for Nash Hospitals, Inc. Pamela L. Carter, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of October 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
